channel.title: Felt like I needed to say this
channel.description:
Ok as you all just saw that Jmod App topic, Phising.
Ok so for some reason forums like the one you just saw have kicked it up a notch ALOT lately. So to help keep you safe (mainly noobs smart people wont go to links) I'm gonna tell you all the links I already know that are scamming.
-Jagexmods.info
Thats all for now, post below and I'll add. Keep your accounts safe!!

item.title: Felt like I needed to say this
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar_X Mr Mopar X
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar_X wrote:

There is no reason to compile a list of scam sites. JaGeX will only message you through your http://www.runescape.com inbox and nowhere else. Obviously, if someone or something links you anywhere it’s a scam.

Read full topic
